name: numerological
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to numerology (= the study of numbers in the belief that they have a special importance in people's lives): He chose a set of numbers with numerological significance. Some even believe strongly in astrological and numerological charts.
More examplesFewer examplesEvery single person’s numerological profile is totally personal and unique.It turns into a tale of numerological obsession and hidden guilt revolving around the number 23.I'm not someone who places much stock in numerological "mysticism".
